topics.title: Describe Your Favorite Animal
topics.prompt: Talk about your favorite animal and explain why you like it.
topics.hint: 說明你喜歡的動物是什麼，並且描述幾個原因，建議說3~5句
topics.sample: My favorite animal is a dog. Dogs are friendly and loyal. They can be great companions. I like their energy and how they make people happy.

topics.title: Imagine Your Own Farm
topics.prompt: Describe a farm you would like to have. What animals would you keep there?
topics.hint: 想像你有一個農場，說出你會飼養哪些動物，以及簡單描述他們，建議說4~6句
topics.sample: I would have a farm with cows, chickens, and horses. I like cows because they give milk. Chickens are fun to watch and lay eggs. Horses are strong and beautiful. I would enjoy taking care of them.

topics.title: Talk About a Visit to a Farm
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you visited a farm or a place with animals.
topics.hint: 敘述你曾經參觀過農場或有動物的地方，可以說你看到了什麼或做了什麼，說3~5句
topics.sample: Last year, I visited a farm with my family. We saw many animals like sheep and ducks. I learned how to feed the animals. It was a fun experience and I liked it very much.

topics.title: Animal Sounds Practice
topics.prompt: Name some animals and imitate the sounds they make.
topics.hint: 挑選幾種動物，模仿牠們的叫聲，可以說3~5句，也可以加入你喜歡的動物聲音
topics.sample: A dog says woof, woof. A cat says meow. A cow says moo. I like these sounds because they are easy to remember.

topics.title: Describe a Day on the Farm
topics.prompt: Imagine a day on a farm and describe what happens from morning to evening.
topics.hint: 想像一天在農場的生活，可以包含餵動物、工作、天氣等細節，說4~6句
topics.sample: In the morning, the farmer wakes up early. He feeds the chickens and cows. During the day, he takes care of the plants. In the evening, he checks on the animals again. It is a busy but nice day.

topics.title: Favorite Farm Animal and Why
topics.prompt: Tell me which farm animal you like best and explain why it is special to you.
topics.hint: 說明你最喜歡的農場動物以及原因，可以包含動物的外觀、性格或功能，說3~5句
topics.sample: My favorite farm animal is the horse. Horses are fast and strong. They can help with work on the farm. I also think they are very beautiful animals.

topics.title: Farm Animal Sounds Song
topics.prompt: Create your own short song or rhyme about farm animals and their sounds.
topics.hint: 用簡單的句子組成一個關於農場動物和叫聲的歌或詩，說2~4句
topics.sample: On the farm, the dog says bark. The cow says moo, and the chicken goes cluck. The horse says neigh, all day long!

topics.title: How to Take Care of Animals
topics.prompt: Explain how to take good care of animals on a farm.
topics.hint: 說明農場動物照顧的方法，可以包含餵食、清潔和保護，說4~6句
topics.sample: Animals need fresh water and food every day. Farmers should clean their living space regularly. It is important to keep animals healthy. They also need love and attention.

topics.title: Talk About a Pet You Have or Want
topics.prompt: Describe a pet you have or one you wish to have in the future.
topics.hint: 描述你現在有的寵物或將來想要的寵物，說明牠長得怎麼樣，個性或你們的關係，說3~5句
topics.sample: I have a cat. She is small and white. She loves to sleep on my bed. I enjoy playing with her every day.

topics.title: Farm Animals in Different Countries
topics.prompt: Talk about common farm animals in your country and how they are used.
topics.hint: 分享你國家常見的農場動物，以及牠們供應什麼，如牛奶、肉或工作用，說4~6句
topics.sample: In my country, cows and chickens are popular farm animals. Cows provide milk that we drink. Chickens give us eggs and meat. Some farmers also raise pigs for food.
